attributes.action: Stop the nursery fees while you're self isolate during the COVID19.
attributes.additional_details:
While you're whole family needs to isolate do to the COVID19,  to protect the others,  you need to keep the kids at home and getting paid SSP, almost nothing,but still need to pay nursery fees on full along all the bills and still survive.

Nursery fees should be cut off during the isolation or putting up the SSP during this pandemic and make more accessible the GOV support
attributes.background: Some families,on low income, can't afford to pay the fees, bills and rent/ mortgage!

rejection.details:
The Government isn't responsible for nursery fees, these are a matter for individual providers.

We have published the following petition about sick pay, which you might like to sign:

Fund full sick pay for employees that are off work due to COVID: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551962
